评论详情: Love this sweater so much. The fit is perfect, true to size. Very flattering, we used it for family pictures and we are so happy with it. It is stretchy, kind of oversized but do get your regular size and the fit will be perfect. So worth it! 5/5 stars.
Such a cute sweater and very good quality, I was quite impressed. It's a crochet like material which makes it a little heavy but not overbearing. Fits super cute on my daughter!

评论概述: Adorable sweater that looks like your grandmother hand made!
评论详情: I got this as a gift for my niece and it is true to size you could order a size up to get a little extra time out of it, but this sweater is darling. It looks like your grandmother hand stitched it and it’s so cute the quality is amazing and so is the coloring.
Such a cute sweater! Good quality and cozy! Perfect if you want an oversized look!
Fits true to size and washes so well! My daughter gets so many complaints on it. Can also easily get stains out of it.
Absolutely adorable sweater. Runs a bit large

Don’t hesitate, this swear is well worth the price. It’s nice and soft, not too thick or stiff. The colors are all true and each color is the same size. I have bought black, lavender, and mint green. Plan on getting more! Bought 18-24month and it fits an 18 month old nice and oversized.
My daughter wore this for family photos. Loved this sweater! Size up for an oversized look!
This is one of my favorite sweaters. So cute.

I usually do not write reviews, but just came in to say this is the best find for my 10 month baby. Absolutely gorgeous fits perfect and keeps her warm. To the makers please create more designs, your product is high quality!

I love the thickness, color and design however the sleeve came with an open seam. I had to sew it together. I was going to change it for another but I didn’t have enough time before the picture day so I fixed it myself.
I bought four of these. They are really cute. Important to note- they run really big. I bought one for a two year old and it fit our eight year old.
Nice quality, but runs big.  I had to replace with a size smaller.
Large but cute

I really liked this sweater, it has a cute baggy fit. It's on the thicker side, perfect for a cooler day. The color is a gorgeous brown/rust.
Very well made and super cute! Fits my 3 month old with room to grow.

Its beautiful and keeps her warm but the flowers started to fray very easily.

I adore this sweater. It's so stinking cute and surprisingly good quality for Amazon. We bought a few sizes up for our girl, which is great because it looks very cute oversized with the sleeves rolled up and this way it will fit her longer.  Seriously just buy it.
Runs large. Very cute though.
Great sweater soft and sizing was accurate
This sweater was soo cute! Super soft and warm! The only downside was it does run big! But it worked perfectly for a little oversized look!
Darker than advertised, but it’s baby clothes so the cuteness kinda overrode the discrepancy in color. It is slightly a bummer since we’re doing photos with this sweater but it’s all good.
Bought this for a friend’s baby shower. The color and fabric matches the website description. Super cute and girly. Would be great for monthly photo shoots!
This sweater is adorable! Looks a little big but I’m glad, we’re going to wear it over sized.

Got this for my baby girl for her one month photoshoot. It fit great with room to grow and is a nice material, pretty thick and warm. It washes well and the color is exactly as pictured. Will have to get more in bigger sizes for next winter!

We love this sweater, but it did run extremely large. My daughter who wears 9-12 month is wearing a 3-6 month sweater which looks oversized. I ordered a 0-3 month in a different color which fit her well, but we sent it back and kept the larger one for longer wear.
We got so many compliments on this fit! We love the color! It fits great! And use to wash! Recommend this sweater to so many people!

评论概述: A Five-Star Sweater for a Memorable First Birthday!
评论详情: I couldn't be happier with this adorable pink sweater I purchased for my daughter's first birthday party! The delicate little flowers added such a sweet touch to her outfit. Not only did it look absolutely precious on her, but the quality of the fabric was also superb. It kept her warm and cozy throughout the celebration, and even after multiple washes, it still looks as good as new. Thank you for helping make her special day even more memorable!

The print and quality of the sweater was great but keep in mind it is a very oversized sweater. My toddler just turned 3 she’s wearing 3T items I bought her the 18-24 month sweater and it fit her a tad oversized. But overall I loved it, the design is so cute
These sweaters were so cute and comfy that I bought three different colors! They were the cutest oversized sweaters for my toddler!

cute but they run super big

评论概述: READ THIS!!! Great but SIZE DOWN!!
评论详情: Okay so I loveeeeee this sweater design. One of the flowers is missing a petal but honestly it gives the sweater a homemade feel to it. I read lots of reviews for the same sweater from different sellers and I’m so glad I did because you have to size down! My daughter is a 1 year old and wears size 12 months for reference. I ordered a 6-9 months and it’s still oversized which I was going for! I can’t imagine how big the 12 months would be. Please size down considerably!
It’s super cute the material is thick which is nice. It runs huge tho.. I got my daughter the 2-3t and it looks like it could be one of my cropped sweaters.
This sweater looks amazing! The flower stitch detail is perfect, it’s cozy and only shrank a tiny bit after wash. Definitely worth it!
Soft, cute, fits great and has that cute skimpy sweater look to it. Great value!
So chic and adorable. Good quality and great for the price

I bought this sweater for my daughter for Christmas and she was finally able to wear it so after wearing it for a day I put it in the washer to be washed. I get it out of the washer to put in the dryer and the whole sweater literally fell apart in the washer!! I’m sorry are you not supposed to wash it or something? I’m confused as to how or why it fell apart in the washer!! Waste of money!!!!! Not worth it
Bought this for my daughter. She’s a little small so the sweater fit her a little oversized, but honestly it couldn’t have looked cuter! Great quality. She’s 18 months, bought 2T

Exactly as pictured. Soft material and the little flowers held up well in the washer. True to size
Absolutely adorable and beautifully made! Purchased this as a gift for my niece and I will be thrilled to see her in it. I only wish they sold this sweater in adult sizes too; it’s just that perfect.
The sweater is thick, and well made.  Room to grow for this 8 month old.And very cute.  Many compliments.

Purchased for family pictures and while I loved the vibe, I ultimately ended up returning the item in favor of another outfit. The quality and fit were as expected and the pictures looked very accurate to the piece that showed up at my house.

This is a beautiful sweater but in no way it is for a three-month old baby. It runs very large, more for a six-month old baby
This tore after one wear!

I got this for my daughter to use under her Hedwig wings for Halloween. The "cream white" color is a true white, and I was easily able to cut the brown thread for the flower centers out of the sweater, without damaging any of the other stitching. The sweater runs a little bit big, so while the 12-18m size looked oversized on my 18m daughter back in October, it still looks great now that she's grown a bit and is almost 2yo. It's about the same size as Old Navy 2T, but it's forgiving if it's a little big since oversized sweaters are common now. The sweater washes well, and it still looks almost new after months of use. Food stains come right out with a little stain remover, and there's no pilling or other visible fabric wear, even though I dry it in the dryer instead of laying it flat to dry. Overall this is a great sweater that I would happily get again!

I ordered the beige size 9-12 months for my daughter and it was just the look I wanted. It’s super cute and good quality. It runs big so be sure to size down. I’ll be ordering another one! Sweater came in the next day.
This sweater is absolutely adorable, it is just as pictured and is true to size. I will say it is not the softest material but my daughter doesn’t seem to mind!
This is warm, adorable, and well made. No holes or strings anywhere.
We love this sweater! Super cute with all baby pants from denim shorts to overalls. It is thick and high quality and has held up with washing and baby spit up!
Love this sweater! Super cute and true to size.

This is the cutest little sweater! Bought as a baby shower gift, then ended up buying a second one for my own little girl! The material is soft and stretchy, and seems to be good quality. Fit seems to run on the bigger end so hoping to get lots of use out of it!
